institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 30 (Method of Participation Depending on Participating Athletes’ Affiliation, etc.)
contents: Article 30 (Participation method according to participating player affiliation, etc.) ① Athletes participating in local competitions, in principle, participate with their resident registration. However, athletes who wish to participate as industrial workers must participate as corporate workers. Revised on January 8, 2021, ② The resident registration address of a participating player refers to the most recent resident registration address with a period of residence of more than 6 months as of the deadline for application submission for local competitions. To prove this, a copy of resident registration may be requested when submitting the participation application. . Revised 2021. 1. 8., ③ Deleted 2021. 1. 8.
